title: James Webster and Bella Jakubiak expecting their first child
text:
They both found fame on reality TV shows, and eventually fell madly in love.

And now Married At First Sight's James Webster and My Kitchen Rules star Bella Jakubiak are about to welcome their very first baby into the world.

On Thursday, James took to Instagram to show off Bella's glorious belly.

Positively glowing: On Thursday, Married At First Sight's James Webster took to Instagram to show off his wife Bella Jakubiak's (pictured) glorious baby bump

He captioned the pic: 'The doctor said it might take a while and told us to go for a walk and BOOM! I spotted another [four leaf clover]. Feeling lucky!

In another picture taken the day before, the reality TV lovebirds enjoyed some alfresco dining with friends, while Bella looked visibly radiant.

Taking to Instagram once again, he tagged the pic: 'When the midwife and the doctor don't communicate, you get another day (off) to wait. We are now booked in today at the hospital.'

Ready! On Wednesday, James (pictured front and centre) posted a pic of the couple enjoying some last minute alfresco dining with friends. He captioned the snap: 'When the midwife and the doctor don't communicate, you get another day (off) to wait. We are now booked in at the hospital' Pictured: Bella, second from left

The couple first met at a house party in Bondi back in 2016 and became engaged on Anzac Day 2017 during a romantic trip to the USA.

James revealed at the time Bella was so elated after receiving the ring that she appeared to be floating 'on a cloud'.

'She floated down the mountain on a cloud with a glass of champagne in her hand, showing everyone her ring,' he said.

Strong foundations: James and Bella first met in Bondi in 2016 and became engaged on Anzac Day 2017 during a romantic trip to the USA

The MAFS star added: 'While I sweated bullets climbing over the rocks!'

In October 2017, Bella and James tied the knot at a rural ceremony at St. Mary's church in the small town of Bungendore in New South Wales.

According to Woman's Day, the reception had a nod to Bella's Polish roots, where guests enjoyed a lavish vodka, oyster and caviar bar and instead of a traditional wedding cake, the duo cut into a cheese tower.

Madly in love: The couple first met at a house party in Bondi back in 2016 and became engaged on Anzac Day 2017 during a romantic trip to the USA

In 2011, Bella and her sister Samantha were crowned the winners My Kitchen Rules after beating Victorian couple Kane and Lee.

Meanwhile, James attempted to find love on the premiere season of MAFS in 2015.

However, his short-lived relationship with bride Michelle didn't work out.
description: They both found fame on reality TV shows, and eventually fell madly in love.
authors: Shannon Shipley For Daily Mail Australia
